item.title: Downpour devastates Raichur district, claims coupleâ€™s lives

Pics: A temporary bridge in Pattepur village of Raichur taluk was washed away by rain on Wednesday evening; A couple lost their lives when a tree was uprooted by fierce winds on Wednesday evening at the outskirts of Mudgal town in Raichur districtRaichur: Intense downpour on Wednesday in Raichur district created considerable difficulties for the residents. The heavy rainfall caused a makeshift bridge to collapse, which cut off access to five villages. In a different incident, a tree fe...]]>
item.author: Tnn
